docs.title: Main Page
docs.text:
Hi, This is Stella's website made with MkDocs, if you're here you're probably looking for the WIP wiki for mod features, you can navigate to it using the Sidebar

You are free to take and use this as you please under GNU General Public v3.0 License

docs.title: Mod Features
docs.text: This Wiki is a WIP, this is going to start with SkyHanni, and possibly add other Mods, their features, and downloads for those mods

docs.title: Skyblock Mods
docs.text:
SkyHanni - (1.8.9) - Huge skyblock mod mostly used for the garden features, and custom scoreboard, depends on NotEnoughUpdates

  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/hannibal002/SkyHanni
  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/skyhanni-997079228510117908

NotEnoughUpdates - Skyblock Mod that adds unique features such as Inventory Buttons, Storage Overlay, and various Skill progress displays

  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/NotEnoughUpdates/NotEnoughUpdates
  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/Moulberry

Skytils - Dungeon mods with various solvers, Crystal Hollow Map, and Dungeon Score Calculation

  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/Skytils/SkytilsMod
  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/skytils

Patcher - General performance improvements for 1.8.9 Minecraft

  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/sk1er
  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/Sk1erLLC/Patcher

OptiFine - Performance improvements for 1.8.9

  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/optifine

docs.title: SkyHanni Features
docs.text: SkyHanni is a popular SkyBlock mod, skyrocketing in popularity shortly after the Garden Update because of it's useful features, it has a lot of features for all sections of the game

docs.title: SkyMart
docs.text:
Shows Copper Prices inside SkyMart by the coin to copper ratio

  • Higher Number is better for Profit

docs.title: Crop Milestones
docs.text: • Shows Crop Milestones in the Stack Size in the Desk Menu

docs.title: Average Milestone
docs.text:
• Shows Average Crop Milestone level, Adds all, of them together then divides by the number of them, Max Average Crop Milestone is 46

  • Unlike the other Features in this category, this does not have anything to do with stack size

docs.title: Crop Upgrades
docs.text: • Shows Crop Upgrades in the stack size of the Desk Menu

docs.title: Composter Upgrades
docs.text: • Shows Upgrades in the Stack Size of the Composter

docs.title: Custom Keybinds
docs.text:
Allows you to set different keybinds for most keys while holding a Farming Tool

  • Allows rebinding the following controls

    Attack, Use Item, Move Left, Move Right, Move Forward, Move Back, Jump, and Sneak

    • Multiple keys on the same action are not allowed

docs.title: Farming Lane
docs.text: How to Configure - Go to the Start of your Farming Lane  - Type /shlanedetection  - Continue Farming until you pass two ends of the lane   - It should now be fully configured and notify you when you finish each lane

docs.title: Lane Switch Notification
docs.text:
• Displays a Sound when you're X (customizable) seconds away from the end of the current lane
    • Supports Customizing Sound, Text, Repeat Duration (How often it repeats), and Pitch

docs.title: Distance Display
docs.text: • Displays a HUD element of how far away you are from the end of the lane

docs.title: Corner Waypoints
docs.text: • Shows the corner of the Lane as a waypoint of the current lane you're farming

docs.title: Display
docs.text: • Displays a HUD Element for your Garden Level in the format "Garden Level X (XP/XP To Level)"

docs.title: Overflow
docs.text: • Changes various Garden Level Displays to show past the SkyBlock max level in the same scaling (10,000 per level past 15)

docs.title: Overflow Chat
docs.text: • Shows Messages for the previous feature each time you pass a milestone,

docs.title: Farming Weight
docs.text: • Farming Weight is a Calculation from "Elite Farmers" More info can be found on Elitebots Website

docs.title: Display
docs.text: • Adds a Display for your current Farming Weight

docs.title: Leaderboard Ranking
docs.text: • Shows your Leaderboard placement if you are in the top 10,000 Farmers on EliteBot

docs.title: Overtake ETA
docs.text: • Shows how long until you'll pass the next player , If you're below 10,000 it will show how long until you're tracked on the leaderboard

docs.title: Show LB Change
docs.text: • Shows if you've lost positions upon entering garden while offline after entering the Garden,

docs.title: Always ETA
docs.text: • Always show Overtake ETA even when not Farming in Garden

docs.title: ETA Goal
docs.text: • Allows you to Set a custo mnumber of position you want to track

docs.title: Show below 200
docs.text: • Shows your weight even if you're below position 200, by default it does not display.

docs.title: Show Outside Garden
docs.text: • Shows the Farming Weight display /outside the Garden

docs.title: Dicer RNG Drop Tracker
docs.text: • Displays What Drops you've gotten with the Melon/Pumpkin Dicer, Like other Trackers it can be customized more from inventories, such as displaying only this Session or Total since mod install

docs.title: Compact Format
docs.text: • Changes the Display from Seperate rows for each Drops to a Colored X/X/X/X Format, taking less Vertical Space

docs.title: Hide Chat
docs.text: • Hides the messages from Dicers

docs.title: Money per Hour
docs.text: • Shows the Money per hour of various Crops

docs.title: Only Show Top
docs.text: • Customizes how many crops on the list you see

docs.title: Extend Top List
docs.text: • Adds the current crop for the tool you're holding into the list, even if it's not in the top threshold set above

docs.title: Always On
docs.text: • Displays it even if you're not farming in Garden, this does not enable it outside Garden

docs.title: Compact Mode
docs.text: • Hides the position and name of the crop (Still shows the Icon) to take up less Horizontal Space

docs.title: Compact Price
docs.text: • Compacts the price by rounding, EG 11,423,132 to 11.4M

docs.title: Use Custom
docs.text: • Allows you to set what the Money/H Defaults to (Eg: Sell Offer, NPC, Instasell)

docs.title: Merge Seeds
docs.text: • Merges the Wheat and Seed price together

docs.title: Include X
docs.text: • Various Toggles to add profit from Bountiful, Mooshroom Cow, Armor Drops, Dicer Drops

docs.title: Hide Title
docs.text: • Hides the first line of the Money/H Display to compact it even further

docs.title: Show Jacob's Contest
docs.text: • Adds a HUD Element with what the next Jacob's Contest is

docs.title: Outside Garden
docs.text: • Shows the HUD Element outside garden

docs.title: In Other GUIs
docs.text: • Shows the Jacob's Contest Display in other Farming GUIs

docs.title: Fetch Contests
docs.text: • If you haven't opened calendar, fetch the Contests from Elitebots API

docs.title: Share Contests
docs.text: • Allows you to share Contests to the Elitebots API so other people can use the previous feature without opening

docs.title: Warning
docs.text: • Displays a Warning for Upcoming Jacob's Contest

docs.title: Warning Time
docs.text: • Customize the amount of seconds before a Contest you're notified

docs.title: Popup Warning
docs.text: • Pops up with a window when the game is out of focus

docs.title: Warn For
docs.text: • Allows you to Customize which crops you want to look forward to
